tool_description: Create SEO compatible content and images with AI!
name: AI Content Generator
title: AI Content Generator

api_list.name: Rewrite Article Human-like
api_list.description: Re-write your ai-generated article with this endpoint! You can get up-to 90-100% Human Generated score!
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ai-content-generator1.p.rapidapi.com/create/rewritePost"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ai-content-generator1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
